member.name: T:Cronos.CronExpression
member.summary: Provides a parser and scheduler for cron expressions.

member.name: F:Cronos.CronExpression.Yearly
member.summary: Represents a cron expression that fires on Jan 1st every year at midnight. Equals to "0 0 1 1 *".

member.name: F:Cronos.CronExpression.Weekly
member.summary: Represents a cron expression that fires every Sunday at midnight. Equals to "0 0 * * 0".

member.name: F:Cronos.CronExpression.Monthly
member.summary: Represents a cron expression that fires on 1st day of every month at midnight. Equals to "0 0 1 * *".

member.name: F:Cronos.CronExpression.Daily
member.summary: Represents a cron expression that fires every day at midnight. Equals to "0 0 * * *".

member.name: F:Cronos.CronExpression.Hourly
member.summary: Represents a cron expression that fires every hour at the beginning of the hour. Equals to "0 * * * *".

member.name: F:Cronos.CronExpression.EveryMinute
member.summary: Represents a cron expression that fires every minute. Equals to "* * * * *".

member.name: F:Cronos.CronExpression.EverySecond
member.summary: Represents a cron expression that fires every second. Equals to "* * * * * *".

member.name: M:Cronos.CronExpression.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a new based on the specified cron expression. It's supported expressions consisting of 5 fields: minute, hour, day of month, month, day of week. If you want to parse non-standard cron expressions use with specified CronFields argument. See more: https://github.com/HangfireIO/Cronos

member.name: M:Cronos.CronExpression.Parse(System.String,Cronos.CronFormat)
member.summary: Constructs a new based on the specified cron expression. It's supported expressions consisting of 5 or 6 fields: second (optional), minute, hour, day of month, month, day of week. See more: https://github.com/HangfireIO/Cronos

member.name: M:Cronos.CronExpression.TryParse(System.String,Cronos.CronExpression@)
member.summary: Constructs a new based on the specified cron expression with the format. A return value indicates whether the operation succeeded.

member.name: M:Cronos.CronExpression.TryParse(System.String,Cronos.CronFormat,Cronos.CronExpression@)
member.summary: Constructs a new based on the specified cron expression with the specified . A return value indicates whether the operation succeeded.

member.name: M:Cronos.CronExpression.GetNextOccurrence(System.DateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates next occurrence starting with (optionally ) in UTC time zone.

member.name: M:Cronos.CronExpression.GetNextOccurrence(System.DateTime,System.TimeZoneInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates next occurrence starting with (optionally ) in given

member.name: M:Cronos.CronExpression.GetNextOccurrence(System.DateTimeOffset,System.TimeZoneInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates next occurrence starting with (optionally ) in given

member.name: M:Cronos.CronExpression.GetOccurrences(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the list of next occurrences within the given date/time range, including and excluding by default, and UTC time zone. When none of the occurrences found, an empty list is returned.

member.name: M:Cronos.CronExpression.GetOccurrences(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.TimeZoneInfo,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the list of next occurrences within the given date/time range, including and excluding by default, and specified time zone. When none of the occurrences found, an empty list is returned.

member.name: M:Cronos.CronExpression.GetOccurrences(System.DateTimeOffset,System.DateTimeOffset,System.TimeZoneInfo,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the list of occurrences within the given date/time offset range, including and excluding by default. When none of the occurrences found, an empty list is returned.

member.name: M:Cronos.CronExpression.Equals(Cronos.CronExpression)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified is equal to the current .
member.param: The to compare with the current .
member.returns: true if the specified is equal to the current ; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Cronos.CronExpression.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified is equal to this instance.
member.param: The to compare with this instance.
member.returns: true if the specified is equal to this instance; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Cronos.CronExpression.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a hash code for this instance.
member.returns: A hash code for this instance, suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.

member.name: M:Cronos.CronExpression.op_Equality(Cronos.CronExpression,Cronos.CronExpression)
member.summary: Implements the operator ==.

member.name: M:Cronos.CronExpression.op_Inequality(Cronos.CronExpression,Cronos.CronExpression)
member.summary: Implements the operator !=.

member.name: T:Cronos.CronFormat
member.summary: Defines the cron format options that customize string parsing for .

member.name: F:Cronos.CronFormat.Standard
member.summary: Parsing string must contain only 5 fields: minute, hour, day of month, month, day of week.

member.name: F:Cronos.CronFormat.IncludeSeconds
member.summary: Second field must be specified in parsing string.

member.name: T:Cronos.CronFormatException
member.summary: Represents an exception that's thrown, when invalid Cron expression is given.

member.name: M:Cronos.CronFormatException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Cronos.CronFormatException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

member.name: M:Cronos.CronFormatException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
